welcome.title: What is ViaDe_ES1C?
welcome.presentation: ViaDe is a decentralized application for route management. It is developed in the Solid web ecosystem. It allows us to visualize our tracks, share them with our friends, download and upload them.

routes.title: Visualize tracks
routes.loadWarningMessage: There is no route in the POD
routes.imageErrorMessage: There are no permissions to access to images or are not found
routes.videoErrorMessage: There are no permissions to access to videos or are not found

share.title: Share my tracks
share.createSharePrompt: Choose the friends and the track you want to share with them
share.errorFriends: There's no friend selected to share
share.warningShareMessage: Track has been alredy shared with
share.errorPermissionMessage: You are not allowed to access to this folder
share.warningDeleteMessage: Track's copy has not been removed correctly
share.warningLoadMessage: There are no tracks to share
share.errorFriendsFolder: Folder not found in friend's pod

upload.title: Upload my tracks
upload.uploadPrompt: Choose the files of the routes you want to upload
upload.errorMessage: You must upload a file with extension ".json"

download.title: Download track
download.errorMessage: Make sure the entered route exists in the Pod and that you type it correctly

friends.title: My friends
friends.addTitle: Enter the WebID of the new friend
friends.deleteTitle: Choose the friend you want to delete
friends.addErrorMessage: The entered WebId is not valid
friends.checkErrorMessage: The friend to add is already a friend

groups.title: My groups
groups.addToGroupTitle: Select the friends you want to invite to the group

alert.message: THIS OPTION IS NOT AVAILABLE YET
